Name: Flood_Cologne_1
questText_en: It has been raining a lot recently.
questText_de-DE: Es hat in letzter Zeit viel geregnet

Name: Flood_Cologne_2
questText_en: How much does it have to flood for the rhine to flood?
questText_de-DE: Wieviel muss es regnen bis der Rhein überläuft?

Name: Flood_Cologne_3
questText_en: The waterlevel is rising, where can I get to safety!?
questText_de-DE: Der Wasserspiegel steigt, wo bin ich sicher!?
